title: The Ghostbuster and the Almighty Man - Novel Updates
tags: Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Ghosts   Obsessive Love
author: 曲一
description: As a star, he had seen the best times. He found something scary and turned to an almighty man for help. In the end, they fell in love with each other. Zheng Quzhi said:“Mr. Wei, there is something dirty!” Wei Yan called him over and did something... It turned out the man was even scarier than ghosts...>
